query:
ALTER TABLE ai_personas 
ADD COLUMN layoutStyle ENUM('minimal', 'professional', 'custom') DEFAULT 'minimal' NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN backgroundImageUrl VARCHAR(512),
ADD COLUMN profilePhotoUrl VARCHAR(512),
ADD COLUMN tagline VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN suggestedQuestions TEXT,
ADD COLUMN showQuickButtons BOOLEAN DEFAULT true NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN chatPlaceholder VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT '輸入您的問題...';
